pages.text: Now that it's more or less safe in my home and I'm not obsessed with the heat or my hunger, I notice some new things about the environment. When I walk, I can feel an energy humming around me. Even if I can't see anything I feel strongly that I am not imagining it. Just like the temperature changes in different areas, the vibration of this energy seems to change also. In some places full of

plant life, the energy feels vibrant and pleasing, while in other places, namely those with little life, it feels hollow and depressing.$(br2)I'm curious if I can develop any method of understanding or seeing this energy, and I wonder what it means that it is here at all.
